entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke becoming local smoke early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 11 May 2023
